an8.77:4.1: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an8.77:4.3: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
an8.77:5.1: * “Aṭṭhime, āvuso, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an8.77:5.3: Idhāvuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.77:5.5: Tassa uṭṭhahato, ghaṭato, vāyamato lābhāya lābho nuppajjati.
an8.77:5.6: So tena alābhena socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṃ kandati, sammohaṃ āpajjati.
an8.77:5.7: Ayaṃ vuccatāvuso, ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, uṭṭhahati, ghaṭati, vāyamati lābhāya, na ca lābhī, socī ca paridevī ca, cuto ca saddhammā’. (1)
an8.77:6.1: Idha panāvuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.77:6.3: Tassa uṭṭhahato ghaṭato vāyamato lābhāya lābho uppajjati.
an8.77:6.4: So tena lābhena majjati pamajjati pamādamāpajjati.
